Chipset.query: Select PNPDeviceID From Win32_PNPEntity WHERE Caption LIKE '%Series Chipset Family%' OR Caption LIKE '%Chipset%' AND Caption LIKE '%AMD%'
Select Caption From Win32_PNPEntity WHERE Caption LIKE '%chipset%'

Tela.query: Select PnPDeviceID From Win32_DesktopMonitor WHERE MonitorType LIKE '%PnP%' AND PnPDeviceID LIKE '%BOE%' OR PnPDeviceID LIKE '%LG%' OR PnPDeviceID LIKE '%NCP%'
Select PnPDeviceID From Win32_DesktopMonitor WHERE MonitorType LIKE '%PnP%' AND PnPDeviceID LIKE '%BOE%' OR PnPDeviceID LIKE '%LG%'
